results.pmsGrams: Grams of Potassium Metabisulphite (K2S2O5) to add

info: Be aware not all SO2 is converted to Free SO2. Conversion to Free SO2 is strongly linked to a number of factors including and not restricted to temperature, pH and turbidity. This formula assumes that 100% of a PMS solution liberates 57% as SO2.

formula.description: Formula for Potassium Metabisulphite (PMS) addition calculation
steps: PMS (g) = (SO2 rate mg/L Ã— Volume L) / 570
